attributes.action: Ban sexual and drug related music videos and lyrics in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children in the country are seemingly becoming more and more sleazy because of the influence of the huge music stars. Artists such as Rihanna, 50 Cent, Jay-Z, Hinder and many others are influencing children in the wrong way.  

Such as on Jo Frosts program, a 13 year old girl dressing like a hooker to get boys attention, its disgusting! 

Ban all of this music from being aired in the united kingdom on radio and video, and accessed on-line.

In the 80s a song with the lyrics "make me wanna come" was banned from being aired.  Now you have people rapping about shooting each other, taking drugs and having sex for fun and you do not ban it, it is disgusting.

Sign up and help get this banned!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
